content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining and Distribution System at Position (x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at Position (x=41.0, y=-82.0)
- Burner Inserter at Position (x=41.5, y=-83.5), waiting for source items
- Wooden Chest at Position (x=40.5, y=-83.5) (empty)
- Wooden Chest at Position (x=42.5, y=-83.5) containing 71 units of coal
- Burner Inserter at Position (x=41.5, y=-80.5), working
- Wooden Chest at Position (x=41.5, y=-79.5) containing 771 units of coal
- BeltGroup connecting the chests, consisting of 2 belts, transporting coal

### Iron Plate Production Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at Position (x=0.0, y=0.0), working, with iron ore and producing iron plates
- Furnace at Position (x=2.0, y=0.0), working, with iron ore and producing iron plates

## ERROR TIPS

### Inserter Waiting for Source Items
- Ensure that the source entity feeding into the inserter has items available for transfer. Check the inventory of the source entity to confirm it contains the necessary items.

### General Tips
- Regularly check the status of inserters and ensure they are positioned correctly to pick up and drop items efficiently.
- Verify that all entities are fueled and operational to maintain continuous production and avoid bottlenecks.
